import React, {useRef} from "react"; import {connect} from 'react-redux' import s from './order.module.css' import {ordenAlfabetico} from '../../redux/actions' function Order({ordenAlfabetico}){ let miRef = useRef(null); function cambiarEstado(){ ordenAlfabetico(miRef.current.value) } return (
) } export default connect ()(Order)
